title: Manabi Ikiru wa Fuufu no Tsutome
original_name: 学び生きるは夫婦のつとめ
sinopse:
Hiroshiman boy Otogi Onijiro, and Russian girl Paulina are a newly-wed couple in their third year of high school. Together, they will learn about proper physical relations as they raid their high school life!

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
